text: Bayakubuza wena (Muhammad) ngokuthwasa kweenyanga. Yithi: “Le yimiqondiso yokuphawula amaxesha amiselwe uluntu neHajji”. Ayibobungcwele ukungena emizini yenu ngasemva kodwa ongcwele ngulowo woyika uAllâh. Ke ngoko ngenani ezindlwini zenu ngeminyango yokwenene, noyike uAllâh khon’ukuze nibe nempumelelo
